website_summaries.verdict: A favorite amidst stylists, this salon quality shampoo delivers on all of its promises.
pros: Has a pleasant herbal and mint scent that we couldn't get enough of
Leaves scalp feeling cool and clean
Provides instant relief from dry, itchy scalp
You only need a small amount of product, as it lathers quite efficiently
Makes hair soft and silky after just one use
cons: Sits at a higher price point than most

website_summaries.verdict: A deeply nourishing shampoo that cools and calms itchy scalps.
pros: Moisturizes and soothes your dry, itchy scalp
cons: A few have complained about leaking or broken bottles

customer_reviews.title: Caution: NOT the real product by Paul Mitchell!
customer_reviews.text: See photo: the REAL product (purchased at my stylist's salon) is on the right. What I received via Amazon is on the left - no mention of Paul Mitchell. Hmmm. I suggest you read the #1 ratings - the product I received was NOT the same wonderful shampoo I've used and loved for over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Look a little closer!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to comment on several reviews that were written regarding this Tea Tree Special Shampoo. People are saying if it doesn’t have the name “John Paul Mitchell” on the front of the bottle, it’s not the real Paul Mitchell shampoo. If you refer to my pictures you will see that my bottle doesn’t say his name on the front either, BUT it does say it on the back of the bottle. This shampoo is most definitely the real deal. Just saying!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bunkers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe all of the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same product that I get from my salon. It’s not counterfeit. I get the exact same results as if I would’ve bought the product from my salon but saved a lot of money from Amazon. I have combination oily/dry scalp. It’s the only shampoo that works for my condition. Other shampoo’s have failed irritating and making my symptoms even worse. I think some of the negative reviews are from salon employees trying to discourage people from buying the same product from Amazon instead of buying it from their salon. Thank you Amazon. I’m a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Bleacher

customer_reviews.title: Purchased through Asazi Beauty and the bottle came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through Asazi Beauty and the bottle came with a broken cap. The shampoo had a strong chemical smell and didn't have the tingling feeling that the original/ authentic product does. Contacted the seller to understand why and if they are authorized sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Yadav

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off-DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The real shampoo/conditioner is wonderful and COLOR SAFE. I used this and thought, “eh, I remember it being better.” My girlfriend used it 1 time and all of her coloring washed out immediately. A couple hundred dollars worth of coloring, gone instantly after she had only had it for a month! 4 days before her birthday, thanks a lot...
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is what it says it is...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my husband, who regularly uses this type of conditioner. Typically it smells fresh and minty - this bottle smells rancid. On the packaging there was a label saying they were not responsible for falsely filled bottles, so I did not return it, but it smells quite gross, and I wonder what is really in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, this is not the real deal. The product in the bottle I received is a fake. See my picture of what was bought previously from a retail beauty supply. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: a lifesaver. or a sanity saver.
customer_reviews.text: I struggled for years with scalp dermatitis. My hair was falling out, and I itched so bad I'd wake up in the middle of the night and shampoo my hair. And shampoos... I must have tried dozens, and then rotated them. No help. My only caution is that you can use it too often, because it will dry out your scalp. But just vary your schedule. You won't be sorry. The relief was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: panxerox

customer_reviews.title: This + Hot shower = a broke girl's aroma therapy
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this shampoo since my stylist suggested it for this weird ponytail sore I used to get on my scalp as a child. Minty and refreshing, with a tingling sensation if you leave it in long enough. washes out the thick hair product I use and leaves my hair feeling light and extra clean. Only used once a week (regular shampoos on the other days)
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product / 3 stars for purchase experience.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for about 10 years now. Latest purchase (through amazon) was less than satisfactory. Not do to the product, but the seller/shipper/shipping. The pump was broken when I received the package and shampoo had spilled all over the packaging. And now there is no way to close the product. I did include a picture after cleaning up the mess and was able to actually hold the bottle in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Raymond

customer_reviews.title: my husband found this shampoo to meet his needs wonderfully. I must admit it took some searching to ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally used when staying at “Springhill Suites” on vacation, my husband found this shampoo to meet his needs wonderfully. I must admit it took some searching to find it, but here it was on Amazon. I highly recommend this shampoo...and Springill Suites by Marriott as well! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: SJ, the honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this . It is false advertisement , the picture on here is not what you will get . Instead you will get a green bottle that is not by Paul Mitchell .
customer_reviews.author: Jess_blue

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shampoo for my 11 year old acne around the hairline and backne. Hairline breakouts are already clearing up after just a weeks use. She also has a few flakes that have made her very self conscious. That has already cleared up and I have one happy girl. We already use the Paul Mitchell tea tree soap for our faces so I’m glad we decided to give this shampoo and conditioner a try too. Extremely happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product on Amazon! It is a knock off!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product on Amazon! I love this shampoo but because of possible fraud do not purchase this here.. I did not read the reviews from purchasers of this product through Amazon and should have. Like others the shampoo was leaking all over the box and in the wrapping. The pump does not work. I used the shampoo yesterd morning and it did not eliminate the itchy scalp that tea tree oil normally eliminates immediately.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burton

customer_reviews.title: A pre Used product!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this product it was covered in a non odorous grease. The opening of the shampoo had caked up product on it as if someone had used it. I feel totally disgusted that this is a cleansing product and appears so filthy. I got this as a Father’s Day gift not only did it arrive later than expected I feel as if I can not even gift this disgusting item. All in all the shampoo is great but receiving it in this way makes it totally disgusting. Pretty upset.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Shackett

customer_reviews.title: Best product for occasionally cleaning the Junk out of your hair.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product once a week to strip the other product out of my hair that I use during the week (gel, hairspray, etc). It is the best for that and it doesn't leave the hair feeling fragile. I would only use it once a week however but it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: DStooks

customer_reviews.title: My new fave product
customer_reviews.text: During winter months my scalp gets itchy, dry, and flaky....not attractive. I saw and felt a difference after one wash!! My friend told me her mom used this shampoo while when she was a teacher to avoid catching lice from possible infected students, so I gave it a try for my problem. If you ever used the head and shoulders, this product is like 5X better than head and shoulders. I don’t ever need another shampoo, I’m sticking with this one. I don’t even use conditioner anymore, this shampoo leaves your hair so soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a sensitive scalp.
customer_reviews.text: Works for my husband's sensitive scalp. Every other shampoo we have tried leaves him with acne all over his head. (Except the shampoos made for eczema and psoriasis - they leave open sores on his scalp. We get this delivered every three months by Amazon pantry, so I don't have to remember to pick it up, and he never runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It is what is.
customer_reviews.text: Not orginally from paul Mitchell, it literally states this on the fine print of the bottle. Smells like the product I used at 5 star hotel in south Carolina but their tea tree oil shampoo had a tingling sensation that is profound and unique experience, clearly I sought after and this does not have that, I'm disappointed, but I'm not angry or sad. I trusted other reviewers, I hope this review changes your mind, spend the extra bucks at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DRYING
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shampoo in the past (purchased in a salon). It was a year ago, so it's possible my scalp has changed, but in the past few days since buying again on amazon and using it, my scalp and even ears have quickly become extremely dry, irritated and itchy. Not sure what the cause is but now that I come back to this page and read so many other reviews, I wonder if this product is counterfeit and chemically imbalanced, or the formula changed and they didn't tell anyone. I'm ordering a sample jar from paul mitchell's website as an experiment and will stop using this amazon one. Very weird since it is "ships from and sold by amazon.com".
customer_reviews.author: JakeReviews

customer_reviews.title: Size to Price - was it valued?
customer_reviews.text: Overall you get what you pay for. For $14 bucks this will last most men an eternity but to women with longer hair this may last about 3 months is my guess. I did buy a larger one of these with a squirt nozzle for around $24 I think and that was way bigger and lasted much longer. This size however is small enough for an overnight bag or trip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alohaadventurer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for teen with scalp psoriasis and oily hair
customer_reviews.text: Since starting this shampoo, my daughter's scalp has cleared mostly and her hair is looking beautiful. The other common dandruff shampoo only had a 60% effectiveness and my daughter's hair always seemed brittle and unhealthy with that shampoo. My daughter has used tea tree special shampoo for two months now and her hair is looking great. It takes a month for the shampoo to heal the scalp psoriasis, but it does eventually make that a lot better. We only wash my daughter's hair every second or third day, but tea tree special works well so that she can go a couple of days between shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: R A Vent

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo really strips away any oil. I got this with the intent to be healthy and help my dry scalp issues without using dandruff shampoos. I imagine this would work wonders on someone with oily hair, but I have normal extremely thick hair. I am disappointed that there are artifical colorants in this shampoo! The scent is not terrible - mild. It definitely cleans your hair really well, and pairs really good with the conditioner. Update: It did not help my back acne or dandruff. It's too drying. Had to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: ThrottleDoll

customer_reviews.title: Love, Good for my Psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I am only saying, “Value for the money” but it is too expensive but the only shampoo I use. I used to buy TGel Tar Shampoo for my head for Psoriasis. Then I tried this. It is wonderful. It smells so good and heals my skin and the tingling I love and doesn’t dry out my hair like straw like TGel does. I need this. I am glad I discovered this Shampoo. Only Paul Mitchell! And I only get the Tea Tree Special. I use it Everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Shamepoo that you will never stop using
customer_reviews.text: Another superior Tea Tree Shampoo. Has a wounderfull sent of Tea Tree Oil , latheres up quick and leaves your hair clean and your scalp dandruff free . The Tea Tree oil naturally cleans your hair and scalp leaving it clean and itch free from from a flaky scalp I have been useing this shampoo for 6 years . Other shampoos never worked for me. This shampoo puts the oils bck in your dry scalp and revitalizes your hair to a youthfull feel.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo to help with dry skin/scalp issues. I had previously been using Puriya Tea Tree brand, which really wasn't having any noticeable impact on the itchiness or flakes. I switched to this product at the suggestion of a friend and have noticed a marked improvement. I still have some issues with dry skin, but it's far less noticeable using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Ordered shampoo and conditioner. Used it immediately. LOVE this shampoo. Made my scalp tingle but felt so good. The shampoo is very minty and very strange when I first used it, but will definitely reorder. I was disappointed in that it arrived with a broken pump and part of the shampoo leaked all over into the bag. but it was double bagged, so it didn't get on everything in the box. Amazon issued me a credit, which is most appreciated - they handled it very well. I will purchase this shampoo and conditioner again.
customer_reviews.author: Madcats

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo, really bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo. Good scent, a little tingly from the tea tree oil, and my hair doesn't seem to have issues. The problem is the packaging. Every time except the first time I ordered this years ago the pump has been broken and a couple ounces of shampoo are outside the bottle when it arrives. They put the plastic on to protect against this sort of thing, but I'm really scared my original pump from years ago is going to fail. Fix your damn packaging!
customer_reviews.author: shoerito

customer_reviews.title: Great product if the bottle comes in one piece.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is fine, that's why I ordered it. The packaging, on the other hand, is terrible. The pump is broken, not sure if the bottle is cracked too because of all the product on the bottle and pooled in the small bubble wrap pouch. This is not an acceptable way to ship something like this.
customer_reviews.author: M-L Bugbee

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Horrible Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: So the product is AMAZING! However, it was delivered in poor condition. When I received the package I could instantly smell the shampoo (which I thought was strange). I discovered that the item was placed in an over-sized box without any padding whatsoever. Because of this the product had erupted and spilled some of its contents. It was dry by the time I opened it. That was super upsetting because the product could have easily been empty when I received it. I have no problem with this product, so I will just have to get it from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema on my face, neck and scalp. Nothing was working and I decided to try this product, yes it's a little expensive and well worth it!!! No more problems with eczema I also started using it as my face and body wash. It's nicely cooling and invigorating I also use the Hair and Scalp treatment as a conditioner, my hair no longer falls out and it shines and feels wonderfully soft. Thanks to Paul Mitchell for a wonderful product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Kralosky

customer_reviews.title: Product is great shipping not so much
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Only thing that works for my eczema! My hair feels like it’s breathing when I shampoo it! I love that feeling, however the shipping of the product needs some work. The product was sweeping through the top and the bag that it came in was all dirty with shampoo that came out of the bottle. Meaning I was left with less product-not fair for the price.. They did not surround the bottle with bubble wrap or brown paper for cushion. For such an expensive shampoo I would figure that the shipping would be better. That’s why I’m giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, foams well and doesn't leave my hair super oily
customer_reviews.text: My hair is so stinking annoying. I treat it well - aka, I don't straighten, curl, or add any product other than shampooing and bit of conditioner - but still, it is cruel to me. My biggest problem is hair looking oily a day after washing, particularly in the back, in the center of my head. Most shampoos I've tried either do nothing for me or make my hair feel like a giant chunk of oily nastiness, but this shampoo keeps the problems at bay. It's not a problem solver, but at least it helps, and it also feels good. A nice scent that foams super well and just feels good in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: WHATS NOT TO LOOOOOVE ?!!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love??? The smell is amazing. It’s great for my hair and scalp. I’m African American with natural hair and it doesn’t dry out my hair or scalp. It’s like turning the shower into a spa. I’ve tried other less pricey TEA TREE products and nothing compares to this one. I won’t try another again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I know most people are ordering the tea tree shampoo trying to get the Paul Mitchell line, they're discontinued. But tea tree makes pretty much the same product. I've gotten shampoo and conditioner from them off various sites. The biggest difference from the current ones and the Paul Mitchell one I had before is the scent of the conditioner is different. Love this shampoo though! I have sensitive skin and deal with psoriasis on my scalp and this shampoo helps with my flare ups! (Would not recommend as an alternate to medication and shampoos recommended by your doctor to treat scalp Psoriasis, this just helps with mine).
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rage

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This is the best shampoo that Ive ever used in my life. It is original btw. After reading reviews I’ve ordered one from here and one from Pail Mitchell’s online shop. They are exactly the same. Scent bottle everything. I have oily hair so after 24 hours my hair usually gets super oily but now it’s been 36 hours and still no oil and super dry. Thanks for this product. I’m a lifetime buyer now :)
customer_reviews.author: SalHelva

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is good.
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo is was fine, what was left of it. Opened up the box & bag from being shipped & there was shampoo all over. It seems like the cap just wasn't tightened all the way. But shampoo is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the cool
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist uses this product when washing my hair after a haircut and turned me on to it. I love the cool, tingly, refreshing it gives my scalp and keeps my hair clean and soft. It isn't advertised as a dandruff/flaky scalp shampoo, but it keeps it under control for me. No need for me to buy a dandruff specific product that is harsh on your hair.
customer_reviews.author: coach316dc

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing ! Does feel wonderful though.
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful product I love the way tea tree oil makes my scalp feel and I wanted a shampoo that did the same, but you can’t have your cake and eat it too. This shampoo is extremely drying for me, I have fine hair and lots of it but it’s super sensitive so might not be for others. Personally I have to water it down and then the effects of the tea tree oil aren’t as effective. It’s a nice shampoo, smells amazing ! Just definitely not for dry hair !
customer_reviews.author: SteelerFam1983

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was not sealed and it leaked
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bottle of Tea Tree Special shampoo, I haven't used it yet but wanted to say it came with no seal and had leaked all over inside the plastic bag. It does say Paul Mitchell on the label so I assume it's the real deal. Once I've used the shampoo I'll add to this comment. But my suggestion to whoever is shipping this product to make sure it is sealed. Update: I've used the shampoo twice since I've gotten it, I love the scent and it seems to help my scalp some. I need to get the conditioner too because it leaves your hair a little frizzy. But overall I like the product
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Eggleston-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a Terrible Residue on My Hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one of those people who uses a ton of hair products, so it's not buildup from other stuff. I'm pretty much a wash and go kind of person. A little lazy, in fact!! This shampoo left a weird residue on my hair after using it for several days. I guess it's okay if you need tea tree oil shampoo (I do because it keeps my scalp from breaking out), but I won't buy this brand again. My hair went from shiny and reasonably healthy looking to dirty and separated looking, no matter how long I rinsed it after shampooing. Get something else - for the price this is definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Tree shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampoo. If you're sensitive to menthol, be careful as the peppermint oil in it cooled my scalp and shoulders even. I liked the cooling sensation and it lasted at least 10 mins post-shower. I have itchy scalp due to my weird allergies, and this did help soothe my scalp itch. I noticed it did strip out the excess product in my hair really well and made my hair feel pretty smooth. It mattered up fairly well. It's kind of thick and resembles conditioner at first, but it worked so well for me I bought the matching conditioner to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away if you are allergic
customer_reviews.text: i tried the Shampoo for the last 6 months. this caused rash and redness on my face. allergy went away once i stopped using it. took me a while to figure it out unfortunately so be careful you are not allergic to any of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say I was Hairdresser! I suffer from seborrhea dermatitis and I have been using what the doctor said to use. We I sat down and was thinking what I as a hairdresser would recommend! It TeaTree shampoo from paul Mitchell! So I bought some of it just to see if it would help me with my problem. Well I can report that after a week of using it, it cleared up my scalp and face! I can shake my head now with the confidence it will not look like a blizzard! I leave it on for 5 or more minutes in the shower. It has the cooling effect that I really love! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lyons

customer_reviews.title: love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The product is exclamellent, love this shampoo. Makes my hair feel very clean and thick feeling. But there was a problem with the packaging in the shipping. By the time I got it there was a few tablespoons of shampoo that leaked out of the bottle. It wasnt broken but the lid was not tight at all. Saying that they at least put it in a bag that was tied tight so only some of it leaked through to the box it came in. But otherwise I love it and the price was outstanding too. $19.99 for this size is very good. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: mahon

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly - Hair loss with daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Tea Tree shampoo. But one thing I hadn’t realized. Do not use more than once per week. I used it nearly each day. After 2 months of using, I started loosing hair my the brush full... literally. My thick long hair is now very thin. Very disappointed. On a positive note, it now only takes 7 minutes to dry my hair vs 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Love the shampoo not the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used this shampoo before and loved it so I decided to buy it from here instead of the store. I bought the shampoo and the conditioner. Not sure what to think though. The first picture is how the bottles came. The right is the conditioner and the left is the shampoo. The shampoo package looks like someone did it by hand and the top was loose and spilled in the bag. The conditioner looks shrink wrapped and untouched. As much as I love this shampoo I may return it the same way I received it.
customer_reviews.author: VashtiRP

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Scent: If you are a fan of mint and eucalyptus, this is the product for you! If you like milder smelling products, this may overwhelm you. Price: Not cheap but I buy the 33.8 oz bottles when they go on sale to keep the unit cost down. Performance: I really like how this shampoo leaves my hair feeling fresh after rinsing. It is important to note that tea tree oil is a strong essential oil and may not work with all scalps. It also contains sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS) which is a normal ingredient but may not agree with sensitive skin. That said, it is a great product and you won't know until you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Tea

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell is no longer what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they changed, but this is no longer the healthy, invigorating, and calming shampoo I used to love. It used to make my hair full with a lot of volume but now it only makes it dull and flat. It sticks all my hair together and weighs them so badly that it's not even possible to comb my hair properly anymore. Consequently it also makes my scalp impossible to breathe and irritated. Probably because of the ridiculous amount of silicone they added into it. Good job making a great product basically the opposite of what it was. So frustrating that I have to start testing new shampoos again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this item from Amazon for a long time and love it. I see a lot of reviews about fake contents or a knock off bottle because Paul Mitchell is not on the front. If you go to the Paul Mitchell website and look at Tea Tree shampoo, his name isn’t on the front of those bottles either. Maybe I am lucky but I have always received the real deal. That great smell and a little tingle to the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake!!!! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product, I guess to tell the difference between the fake and real bottle is by the color of the bottle, matte green is the real stuff, and the glossy bottle is the Amazon/knockoff. This stuff doesn't work well at all, the real stuff which I had bought from a salon years ago, works very well. It is pricy, and does work when you buy the real one, but this fake stuff was awful and I feel ripped off since I could have easily gotten another shampoo (with conditioner) for much less money than this stuff. Everyone do yourself the favor, buy it from a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product for me
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product for me. This does nothing to help with my dry hair, if anything it dries it out even more. I have noticed more hair falling out than usual. I have used this product for 1 month and bad results. It may work for you but not for me. This product is not all natural and definitely has alcohol in it. Paul Mitchell thumbs down!!!!!! P.S This shampoo does burn slightly when applied. Dont get into eye, cause it will burn. The scent is meh at best! Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: nwe5000

customer_reviews.title: Why does the pump top keep leaking?
customer_reviews.text: Alright this shampoo would get a 4 star rating IF I didn't have these issues. First, the bottle arrived inside a plastic bag which was great because the pump top was almost off the bottle and the bag had a lot of shampoo in the bag. Second, after initially using the pump top to refill a small travel size bottle the pump dripped for two days down the side of the bottle... What the heck! I've no idea how much of this bottle was actually lost between the loose pump top in the bag, and constantly dripping for days!
customer_reviews.author: Char C

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shampoo and it is more economic to buy it here than in the store. I like the scent is fantastic and the shampoo cleans very well. I can feel how clean my scalp is after using this shampoo. The product itself is over-priced I think, probably due to the name brand, which is the only reason I'm not giving it 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years! I have psoriasis at the base of my skull, and this shampoo seems to sooth and comfort my scalp. The fragrance is fresh and my hair feels healthy and shiny. Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is fantastic but this is insanely overpriced; thought I was getting a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the size, but I didn't know it came this small and honestly the price was close to that of a full size bottle and it looks identical in the picture in terms of dimensions. I'd give the shampoo itself 6/5 stars and I haven't used any other brand for the last 9 or so years; the stuff is awesome. But this is 4x higher cost/volume than a normal bottle so I have to rate it down a bit due to the highway robbery that entails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality you would expect!
customer_reviews.text: I returned the shampoo. As others have stated, the shampoo has more of a peppermint than tea tree oil scent and it is not how it should be. I am not sure if it is a counterfeit or simply just old product that somehow was purchased through a wholesaler. Paul Mitchell warns about going through other purchasing channels as they are not officially using those. Fact is that the shampoo is different, so if you know the real one, you might not be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Review Master

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have a really dry scalp and this is the only shampoo that helps me. I couldn't live without this, especially in the winter when the air is so dry. The best thing about this product is that just a little bit does the trick. I use this shampoo every day and this size will easily last me 6 months. I put it on and let it sit for about 2 minutes...it has completely cleared up my dry scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Dadwag30

customer_reviews.title: The best value in Tea Tree Oil shampoos
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with dandruff, scalp eczema and/or extreme scalp oiliness needs to get this shampoo. I get the 16.9 fl. oz. and it lasts 4 - 6 months with regular use. I use this 4 times a week and rotate on the alternate days with 1-a salicylic acid-based shampoo (T-Sal), 2-a regular dandruff shampoo (Selsun Blue or generic equivalent) and 3-Nizoral. Rotate these 3 regularly every other day with Paul Mitchell and you have an effective comprehensive treatment plan. I also have a history of scalp skin cancers (basal and squamous cell); not 1 since I started Paul Mitchell rotation regularly. Fair-skinned older folks like me take notice.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair super dry and may cause hair loss
customer_reviews.text: My hair is super dry after using this. I have a natural straight Asian hair and had a hard time comb my hair after use. I noticed on the third times using it a lot of my hair fell off as well. Even though I like the smell and the coolness from my scalp, this is not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Khaow

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Tree shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: The Paul Mitchell tea tree shampoo gives my scalp a menthol-like tingle when washing out my hair. It's pretty unique in that regard. The scent is nice and not overpowering, and I think it's good for overall health of my scalp. The Paul Mitchell brand is important!!! I have tried other non-Paul Mitchell tea tree products, and they don't even come close to quality, despite their claims. It's nice I can purchase this with Prime and not have to go to my local hair salon for it.
customer_reviews.author: no-nonsense

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My hairdresser uses this in her salon and suggested I use it while on COVID-19 lockdown. My hair has grown so quickly and the fragrance leaves you feeling so refreshed. You can actually feel your scalp tingling and smell the peppermint oils as they penetrate the scalp. I brought this and the conditioner, they work well together. It leaves my hair Soft, Strong, fragrant, and growing!! This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I am not a young guy. Never felt like my hair was clean using the usual name shampoos. This was recommended by some pro reviews. It is costly, but, it is great. Not interested in volume, silkiness, glow or any other of that stuff - just wanted to feel like my hair was clean. This product does it and feels tingly (from the peppermint) while being used. Highly recommend. Packaging is sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Bottle spray automatically drops shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with that product but the bottle spray automatically drops shampoo and conditioner all day long without pumping it. It’s wasting so much of the shampoo and conditioner and our bathroom had green stain due to constant drops..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Tree Shampoo Out There
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. Daycare said they had a lice scare and checked everyone but wanted to let all the parents know to be checking. I bought this and it was the perfect size bottle for her and has lasted a long time for being the smallest bottle. I have since bought liters of both the shampoo and conditioner and LOVE it! It's a plus for light headed people that it kills lice. It's perfect for the summer because it does have a cooling effect and makes my hair look and feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Crawley-Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is the shampoo that will have you never ever buying from a drugstore again
customer_reviews.text: I always wondered what my salon used when they washed my hair and after trying out this product I have never went back to store-bought shampoo. It took away my dry scalp and helps with my oily hair as well. I basically use it as shampoo and body wash. I love the scent and I love the It makes my scalp feel in my hair looks. It’s worth the price and I always get the shampoo and conditioner at the combo
customer_reviews.author: Southern shopper Ktown

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my dry scalp and oily roots!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from a dry flaking scalp while having oily roots at the same time. I have tried many other shampoos and conditioners and none of them have been able to do what this one has. This product has helped with my oily roots while relieving my scalp from the flakiness. I know others have said that this is not the real product, but I have not experienced any issues from it! I would recommend it to others with dry scalp problems!
customer_reviews.author: BrittandtheBeach

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having dandruff issues that Head 'n' Shoulders didn't seem to help. Someone suggested he try this, and it made his dandruff even worse. It smells good though.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gruett

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years.
customer_reviews.text: This is my miracle product. I have a dry itchy scalp that gets really bad during our dry summer heat. It doesn’t really flake so dandruff shampoo has never helped. It just gets itchy and feels tight. This product has helped so much! It has a nice cooling effect that stops the itching and moisturizes so my head is not dry. I only wash my hair 2-3 times a week and use this every time I wash and my scalp has never felt better.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this shampoo on Amazon for years without any issues. I recently received the exact product as listed and exactly the same as the shampoo used at the salon I go to. Amazon has a fantastic return/refund policy so I have no doubt that you'll be taken care of if you receive a counterfeit item. that I get from my salon. It’s not counterfeit. I have an oily scalp that can be prone to light breakouts and this is the best shampoo for my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have very high hopes for this but I love the scent of tea tree so I went for it anyways. But I absolutely love this!!! My scalp was always dry, along with my hair being very damaged. After the first use my dandruff was all gone and after only a week of using it my curls are so much healthier! I don’t see myself buying any other shampoo and conditioner set other than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Janzen

customer_reviews.title: My hair feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: I paired this shampoo with the wow conditioner and my hair feels amazingly soft without being heavy. I love the smell and the fact that it doesn't feel like I'm stripping or drying out my hair. After having a baby and living in an area with hard water my hair was looking a feeling rough. I used expensive products, and home remedies with no improvement. I used this bottle at my friend's house and immediately fell in LOVE! I feel pretty passionate about this product because I really didn't think I would ever be able to have nice hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Fake and causes horrible itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. This is nothing like the Paul Mitchell TeaTree oil shampoo bought in the store. This shampoo did not have a tea tree scent and made my head extremely itchy. I had to buy a bottle of head and shoulders to resolve the dandruff and itching this fake shampoo caused.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair managable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using tea tree shampoo for many years. I usually buy this product from my hair salon but they usually only sell the large size. Although it is more product for your money the cost after getting your hair done is over the top. I like Amazon because I can get it in several sizes that is manageable to my budget. but price aside the product is cool on your scalp and leaves your hair fabulous. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is extremely picky about what he puts in his hair, so I ordered this tea tree cause I have heard good things about it and it's made by Paul Mitchell, and he likes it, he has tried sooooo many different shampoos and thrown away most of those, this gets 5 stars and I get a thank you. Try it you'll like it
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent but unable to unlock pump
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent. I have purchased this brand before and use the shampoo mostly during the summer when bugs are in the air and attracted to perspiration. This seems to keep the bugs at bay—at least for me. For the life of me, though, I can’t seem to open up the pump on this bottle. Not sure if it’s defective but I’ll continue to try. The bottle I received seems to be locked really well, so we’ll that the pump is not operational.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! It has this minty smell to it, and makes my scalp feel so clean and fresh! I use it only a couple of times a week bc it’s rather expensive, alternating with head & shoulders for the rest of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny chic

customer_reviews.title: feel better
customer_reviews.text: They call it special for a reason. this is not for daily uses. This product is to heal your scalp from harsh shampoo and conditioners by people who wash their hair everyday like me. You should use it maybe twice a week till you notice your scalp feels better. then maybe once or twice a month. this is why u think its is such a small bottle. it is bigger then small, you get my drift... it has a mint smell to it. keep out of your eyes.. feel better!
customer_reviews.author: Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negative reviews. This product is the real deal and unbeatable!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great value for the money. I works very well in cleaning your hair gently and thoroughly. The tea tree oil ingredient stops itching problems. It smells great and invigorates your scalp. You can't ask for a better shampoo! I agree with others that suspect salon people are leaving dishonest negative feedback to discourage purchases from Amazon. Don't fall for it!
customer_reviews.author: JNjack@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Used product?
customer_reviews.text: I came in a box which was saturated with shampoo. As you can see from the pictures, shampoo throughput the baggie it was placed in. Appears to be a used bottle as pump top is compressed.
customer_reviews.author: jedi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo for those with scalp sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I had tried what seems like several dozens of shampoos over the years before I finally found this one that does not make my scalp itch, smells and feels great, and one I can afford to use every day! I tried from regular to expensive ones that you find in Walgreen to the ones from Salons to all natural/organic shampoos in liquid, powder or even solid forms. A few more shampoo did work without itching scalp but I either didn't like the smell or didn't work for my course hair or was too expensive. This shampoo works well and I can easily afford and buy. Great shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Orange

customer_reviews.title: My hairstylist said WHAT have you done?!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Tea Tree shampoo for a couple years on the recommendation of my hair stylist. I normally buy the shampoo from the salon. But due to covid, I purchased this bottle from Amazon. After a few months using it and after finally getting to go to my hairstylist, she said, “What have you been using on your hair?! Whatever it is, it’s making your hair very waxy.” We think this purchase was either fake, defective, or “expired.”
customer_reviews.author: Sue Tibs

customer_reviews.title: NOT paul mitchell
customer_reviews.text: First off, when you look up Paul mitchell tea tree shampoo this is the first thing that comes up but it is NOT the actual thing. Secondly, for some reason this shampoo made my scalp SO itchy and red. I have been itching my head all day as it was my first time using is last night. And my head isn’t usually sensitive to stuff, but maybe it’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ringer

customer_reviews.title: Make the switch, now!
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist recommended this for me and I haven’t looked back since. Before this, I used ordinary brands you’d find in Target, but apparently some of them leave waxy residues that make your hair oily, which was my problem. I thought that I was washing it too much so I would try to train my hair to only need to be washed every so often. It never worked. But then I bought this and it’s made all the difference! My hair’s more voluminous and overall just looks so much healthier. I’ve also been able to forgo washing it every other day. Once also seen a decrease in the amount of hair that falls off!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Used this at a hotel and loved it. This one seems different.
customer_reviews.text: I used this at a Marriot hotel and loved it. However this one seems different. Scent and feel are not the same. Maybe it's not real? Not sure. The scent is similar, the feel is completely different. You could feel the tea tree oil working when I used the one at the hotel. Can't feel anything at all with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: No more itch!!
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t listen to the reviews claiming this is a fake product. I was skeptical after reading them, but ordered anyway. My shampoo arrived and I tried it that night. I leave it on my head for several minutes while I shave and I definitely feel the incredible tingle working on my scalp. I have psoriasis and this shampoo calms the itch completely for 48 hours. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke K.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor packaging. Great Shampoo , lots of wasted product
customer_reviews.text: Updated review May 6th ,2020 This is a great shampoo for men. Cleans and moisturizes so I dont have to buy a separate one. This shampoo doesn't give me dandruff or dry out my hair. Happy with this. Packaging from Amazon was bad. It leaked out. **** 2nd time purchased. It leaked out even more. A lot of product wasted. DON'T BUY THIS. Not worth the time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rex Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell tea tree shampoo
customer_reviews.text: A great shampoo. I've been using this shampoo for years. I have cereuses on my hair line and couldn't use head and shoulders shampoo because at that time I was having my hair highlighted. My hairdresser recommended it. I love the scent. So refreshing and makes my head tingle. My hair looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Louise Grazulis

customer_reviews.title: 🌱Tea Tree Oil🍃
customer_reviews.text: My family has used this shampoo for years. It helps with dandruff flaking and also helps with facial and body blemishes. It has anti fungal properties as well. Tea tree oil is always a good thing!!
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is a real product, not counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned after some of the reviews. I am happy to say I received authentic product. I encountered this for the first time in a hotel during business travel. I fell in love with it. So glad I have this. Invigorating and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: I love this Paul Mitchel tea tree shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Paul Mitchel tea tree shampoo. I’m using it therapeutically for my 90 year old dads excessive flaky skin and beard and it has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems genuine
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the other reviews to this product are helpful, I got exactly what I expected and as far as people claims of it being a counterfeit product, I think it just has slightly different packaging than is available in salons. It does not mean it is counterfeit, their are manufacturers who have special packaging for different recipients.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal - NOT an imitation
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of people talking about this being a knock off.... I have not had that experience. This product has smelled and performed every bit as well as the product I've purchased from the salon. Also, several folks are talking about the Paul Mitchell name not being on the bottle. I was curious and hoped over to the Paul Mitchell website to look at the shampoo and lo and behold none of them had his name on them anymore. Don't be alarmists, people.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell > Kiehl's > Nexxus
customer_reviews.text: We compared 3 popular brands and the results (which were pretty close) were: 1st Place - Paul Mitchell Tea Tree (brings your hair/scalp to life) 2nd Place - Kiehl's Amino Acid (spa like aroma and smoothness) 3rd Place - Nexxus Therrape (best value, by far, at Costco)
customer_reviews.author: Coach KG

customer_reviews.title: Hey GUYS !!! Best for male conditions
customer_reviews.text: I am a very active male that fights athletes foot along with other typical male skin conditions ... well I used to use another brand of tea tree soap designed for male skin conditions and was paying 35$ for 16 oz when I can buy this shampoo it worked better and double the ounces for less money
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Atteberry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Always use Paul Mitchell products. Only buy such products on Amazon from reputable sellers. Read reviews As described, great buy, very happy. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate packaging for product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but the packaging was inadequate. It was shipped in a bubble cushion envelope. Before I opened the envelope I could smell the product which wasn't a good sign. Once I opened the envelope half of the product had spilled inside. This type of product should be shipped in a box with protective cushion to prevent the bottle from jostling to the point of leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant shampooing with lovely tea tree fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This was used by my hairdresser to shampoo my hair, and it felt great, besides having a most pleasant tea tree fragrance, my head felt renewed! I have sine been a frequent user of this shampoo with much satisfaction. You just need t use a little for a rich lather and clean wash.
customer_reviews.author: Aston Trinidad, W.I.

customer_reviews.title: This is not Paul Mitchell Tea Tree that I'm used to.
customer_reviews.text: The new recipe seems to have changed because this stuff has no tingle to it, the color and smell are a little different, and the results are not as good. Some people are asserting that it's a counterfeit because the Paul Mitchell name is no longer on the front, but it says "Distributed by John Paul Mitchell Systems" on the back in fine print. I think they've either farmed out production to someone cutting corners, or have just changed the ingredients to mass produce it more cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial in so many ways
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampoo. I suffer from chronic headaches/migraines, and this a lifesaver! I use this everytime I have a headache or migraine.. lather it up and let it sit for 5 minutes.. it's literally the only relief.. it's like the mint and tea tree mix instantly sucks the pain out, its crazy, but so good! So if you suffer from migraines or headaches, this is a MUST! But it's also really good for oily hair, and controls dandruff. Lots of different benefits. Give it a shot! I high recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

The fresh scent of tea tree oil, peppermint and lavender invigorates the scalp and leaves hair smelling great. Color safe and ideal for all hair types.

The fresh scent of tea tree oil, peppermint and lavender invigorate the scalp and leave hair smelling great.

It contains the famous Tingle Complex—a blend of tea tree, peppermint and lavender that leaves a cooling, “tingling” sensation on the scalp.

BRAND STORY
